elements.title: Jessie Wright (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Jessie Wright, director of physical medicine at the D.T. Watson Home for Crippled Children, helped invent the rocking bed (pictured) as a treatment for polio?

elements.title: Pacific Australia Labour Mobility scheme (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Pacific Australia Labour Mobility scheme has been criticised for placing workers at risk of modern slavery?

elements.title: G. Michael Brown (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that G. Michael Brown said that his 1980 conviction of four mobsters showed that the Mafia wasn't merely "a figment of Hollywood's imagination."?

elements.title: a Super Bowl-winning defensive tackle (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that a Super Bowl-winning defensive tackle went on to become a U.S. Army chaplain?

elements.title: Asiah Aman (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that upon receiving her pay from His Master's Voice, Asiah Aman was taught by an executive how to open a bank account?

elements.title: WDF World Darts Championship (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that while the 2024 WDF World Darts Championship final featured a 70-year-old, the 2025 final featured a 15-year-old?

elements.title: Niniek Kun Naryatie (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Indonesian ambassador Niniek Kun Naryatie initially wanted to resign as a diplomat after giving birth to her first child, but her husband convinced her not to do so?

elements.title: Trichy assault rifle (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that India's Central Reserve Police Force tested the Trichy assault rifle in mud, rain, and saltwater conditions for reliability and accuracy before ordering the rifle?

elements.title: Frank Deig (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that a restaurant hired Frank Deig to eat its food?

elements.title: Destination of the Month (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Destination of the Month

Kowloon

One of the most densely populated cities on Earth, Hong Kong's mainland portion offers a culture less influenced by the British than the neighboring Island, plus accommodation, dining, and nightlife are generally cheaper.

elements.title: Off the Beaten Path (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Off the Beaten Path

El Cuyo

El Cuyo beckons to visitors looking for a quiet, natural seaside town to bask in the sun undisturbed by revelers while other visitors seek adrenaline-pumping excitement.

elements.title: Featured Travel Topic (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Featured Travel Topic

San Diego International Airport

The main airport to America's finest city is the busiest single runway airport in the world.
